name: Asteroid Cleanup
description:
The game is a take on asteroids where you must destroy the incoming debris for future explorers. Each time you clear a wave with your antimatter rounds, it causes ripples. Through these ripples more shots can come out of your gun, asteroids can move precariously fast, and it gets oh so very dangerous. Good luck pilot, we probably won't be seeing you again.

Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com was used in this project.
